This would be a great use for a Rule:

class ShowNextExceptions extends Tes=
tRule {
  Statement apply(Statement s, Description d) {
    try {
      s.e=
valuate();
    } catch (SQLException e) {
      // FullSQLException does wh=
atever is needed to get all the
getNextException's
      throw FullSQLExcep=
tion(e);
    }
  }
}

public class MyTest {
   @Rule public TestRule t =3D =
new ShowNextExceptions();

   ...
}

David Saff
